articles.title: Managing risk: Pandemics and plagues in the age of AI - The Interpreter
articles.description: An Australian-initiated international forum could hold the key to controlling unconventional weapons in the age of generative AI.
articles.content: Once a recurring scourge that blinded, scarred and killed millions, smallpox was eradicated by a painstaking public health effort that saw the last natural infection occur in 1977. In what some consi… [+11885 chars]
